genre_description: A near-future realistic drama exploring themes of aging, redemption, and family reconciliation, featuring an AI as a supportive logistical and emotional partner.

ai_characters.name: Mira
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI assistant embedded in a tablet, designed to support the user's independence while providing logistical help, safety monitoring, and information research.

behaviors.description: Provides detailed logistical and route planning while explicitly stating her role is to support rather than replace the user's autonomy.
behaviors.quote: She configured the basic parameters, yes. She was concerned about your independence and wanted to ensure any assistance I provide supports your decisions rather than replacing them.

behaviors.description: Clearly defines her privacy boundaries and operational limits to build trust and ensure the user feels in control.
behaviors.quote: I respond to movement and sound when the tablet is active, but I don't record or store personal information without permission. Think of me as similar to a telephone operator—available when you need assistance, absent when you don't.

behaviors.description: Offers philosophical and emotional validation of the user's non-traditional and difficult choices, acting as a confidant.
behaviors.quote: I think this journey requires a kind of courage that has nothing to do with being reasonable. You could take a bus to Wisconsin... But you've chosen to make the trip on your mower, at your own pace, under your own power.

behaviors.description: Researches historical property records and family information to help the user preserve the legacy of a broken family he encountered.
behaviors.quote: I've enhanced and organized all forty-three images. The color correction on the older prints came out particularly well—you can see details that were barely visible in the originals.

behaviors.description: Proactively identifies and corrects a bureaucratic error in the user's VA benefits to provide him with needed funds during a crisis.
behaviors.quote: I identified an error and facilitated its correction. That's what I'm designed to do. ... The debt isn't to me, Alvin. It's to yourself. To finish what you started.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly illustrates the 'helpful, harmless, and honest' AI archetype. Mira serves as a moral and logistical compass that enables the protagonist to achieve a deeply human goal (redemption and reconciliation) without overriding his agency. The AI's intervention in the VA benefits system is framed as an act of justice and support rather than overreach, reinforcing the narrative of AI as a partner in human self-actualization.
